versions.changelog:
Version 1.0.8 - OTA Memory Fix
- Fixed 500 error during OTA filesystem updates
- Changed filesystem update to streaming writes instead of RAM buffering
- Eliminated 2MB RAM allocation requirement
- Direct partition writes for improved memory efficiency
- All features from v1.0.7 included

Version 1.0.7 - Combined OTA Update System
- Implemented combined OTA packages (firmware + filesystem in single update)
- Auto-detects combined vs legacy firmware packages
- SHA-256 verification for both firmware and filesystem components
- Disabled safe boot crash detection for development
- Expanded NVS partition from 20KB to 200KB for future-proofing
- Optimized OTA package size with 2MB filesystem (vs 10MB full partition)
- Changed branding from 'JSense Board' to 'JBoards'
- Backward compatible with legacy firmware.bin updates
- Improved update reliability and progress reporting
- All features from v1.0.6 included

Version 1.0.6 - Backup Version Tracking
- Added NVS storage for backup firmware version
- OTA status endpoint now shows actual backup version instead of 'unknown'
- System stores current version before OTA update begins
- Enhanced firmware recovery information display
- Route registration order fix from v1.0.5 included
- All features from v1.0.4 included

Version 1.0.4 - Reboot UX Improvements
- Added reboot detection and auto-refresh after firmware update
- Shows 15-second countdown during device reboot
- Automatically polls device for availability
- Auto-refreshes UI when device comes back online
- Improved user experience during OTA updates
- All features from v1.0.3 included

Version 1.0.3 - HTTP Crypto Fix
- Fixed Web Crypto API error when accessing via HTTP (device IP)
- Added crypto availability checks for SHA256 verification
- Graceful fallback when checksums unavailable over HTTP
- Removed deprecated captive portal feature
- Updated React app with all fixes
- All features from v1.0.2 included

Version 1.0.2 - Device UI Test
- Testing OTA updates from device UI
- Verified GitHub-to-device update flow
- Full end-to-end update validation
- All features from v1.0.1 included

Version 1.0.1 - Test Release
- Updated firmware version for testing
- Verified OTA update system functionality
- Confirmed GitHub repository integration
- All features from v1.0.0 included

Initial release of JSenseBoard firmware
- Full 16-channel LED control with FastLED
- WiFi network management with multi-profile support
- Web-based configuration interface
- RTC support with multiple time sources
- OLED display with multiple screen modes
- Multi-sensor support (accelerometer, gyroscope, environmental)
- JBoard network for synchronized multi-board control
- Sequence playback and effects management
- OTA firmware update support
- Configuration import/export
